name: Air Lock
description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

name: Arena Trap
description: Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are airborne.

name: Battle Armor
description: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

name: Blaze
description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Fire-type attacks have 1.5x power.

name: Chlorophyll
description: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

name: Clear Body
description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

name: Cloud Nine
description: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

name: Color Change
description: This Pokemon's type changes to the type of a move it's hit by, unless it has the type.

name: Compound Eyes
description: This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.

name: Cute Charm
description: 1/3 chance of infatuating Pokemon of the opposite gender if they make contact.

name: Damp
description: Prevents Explosion and Self-Destruct while this Pokemon is active.

name: Drizzle
description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.

name: Drought
description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.

name: Early Bird
description: This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.

name: Effect Spore
description: 10% chance of poison/paralysis/sleep on others making contact with this Pokemon.

name: Flame Body
description: 1/3 chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned.

name: Flash Fire
description: This Pokemon's Fire attacks do 1.5x damage if hit by one Fire move; Fire immunity.

name: Forecast
description: Castform's type changes to the current weather condition's type, except Sandstorm.

name: Guts
description: If this Pokemon is statused, its Attack is 1.5x; ignores burn halving physical damage.

name: Huge Power
description: This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.

name: Hustle
description: This Pokemon's Attack is 1.5x and accuracy of its physical attacks is 0.8x.

name: Hyper Cutter
description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.

name: Illuminate
description: No competitive use.

name: Immunity
description: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.

name: Inner Focus
description: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch.

name: Insomnia
description: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

name: Intimidate
description: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of opponents by 1 stage.

name: Keen Eye
description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's accuracy stat stage.

name: Levitate
description: This Pokemon is immune to Ground.

name: Lightning Rod
description: This Pokemon draws single-target Electric moves used by opponents to itself.

name: Limber
description: This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.

name: Liquid Ooze
description: This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal.

name: Magma Armor
description: This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.

name: Magnet Pull
description: Prevents Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out, other than this Pokemon.

name: Marvel Scale
description: If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.

name: Minus
description: If an active Pokemon has the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.

name: Natural Cure
description: This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured when it switches out.

name: Oblivious
description: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated. Gaining this Ability while infatuated cures it.

name: Overgrow
description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Grass-type attacks have 1.5x power.

name: Own Tempo
description: This Pokemon cannot be confused.

name: Pickup
description: No competitive use.

name: Plus
description: If an active Pokemon has the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.

name: Poison Point
description: 1/3 chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned.

name: Pressure
description: If this Pokemon is the target of a move, that move loses one additional PP.

name: Pure Power
description: This Pokemon's Attack is doubled.

name: Rain Dish
description: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn.

name: Rock Head
description: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle and crash damage.

name: Rough Skin
description: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/16 of their max HP.

name: Run Away
description: No competitive use.

name: Sand Stream
description: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.

name: Sand Veil
description: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Sandstorm.

name: Serene Grace
description: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.

name: Shadow Tag
description: Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out.

name: Shed Skin
description: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its status cured at the end of each turn.

name: Shell Armor
description: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

name: Shield Dust
description: This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.

name: Soundproof
description: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, including Heal Bell.

name: Speed Boost
description: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage at the end of each full turn on the field.

name: Static
description: 1/3 chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.

name: Stench
description: No competitive use.

name: Sticky Hold
description: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's Ability or attack.

name: Sturdy
description: OHKO moves fail when used against this Pokemon.

name: Suction Cups
description: This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.

name: Swarm
description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Bug-type attacks have 1.5x power.

name: Swift Swim
description: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

name: Synchronize
description: If another Pokemon burns/poisons/paralyzes this Pokemon, it also gets that status.

name: Thick Fat
description: Fire-/Ice-type moves against this Pokemon deal damage with a halved Sp. Atk stat.

name: Torrent
description: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Water-type attacks have 1.5x power.

name: Trace
description: On switch-in, or when it can, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent foe's Ability.

name: Truant
description: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.

name: Vital Spirit
description: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

name: Volt Absorb
description: This Pokemon heals 1/4 its max HP when hit by a damaging Electric move; immunity.

name: Water Absorb
description: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves; Water immunity.

name: Water Veil
description: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.

name: White Smoke
description: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

name: Wonder Guard
description: This Pokemon is only damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.
